body.raw: John Smith is a dedicated criminal defense attorney known for his fierce advocacy and commitment to protecting the rights of the accused. With a successful track record of defending clients facing a variety of criminal charges, including DUI, drug offenses, and white-collar crimes, John brings a wealth of experience and expertise to every case he handles.
